Quick search

Continuous module¶

This module contains optimal transport methods based on the Monge formulation of the optimal transport problem.

CDT¶

class optrans.continuous.CDT¶

Cumulative Distribution Transform.

References

[The cumulative distribution transform and linear pattern classification] (https://arxiv.org/abs/1507.05936)

Attributes

displacements_ (1d array) Displacements u.
transport_map_ (1d array) Transport map f.

Methods

apply_forward_map(transport_map, sig1)¶

Appy forward transport map.

Parameters:

transport_map : 1d array

Forward transport map.

sig1 : 1d array

Signal to transform.
Returns:

sig0_recon : 1d array

Reconstructed reference signal sig0.
apply_inverse_map(transport_map, sig0)¶

Apply inverse transport map.

Parameters:

transport_map : 1d array

Forward transport map. Inverse is computed in this function.

sig0 : 1d array

Reference signal.
Returns:

sig1_recon : 1d array

Reconstructed signal sig1.
forward(sig0, sig1)¶

Forward transform.

Parameters:

sig0 : 1d array

Reference signal.

sig1 : 1d array

Signal to transform.
Returns:

lot : 1d array

CDT of input signal sig1.
inverse()¶

Inverse transform.

Returns:

sig1_recon : 1d array

Reconstructed signal sig1.
